summary: FAILURE OF BRAKES - BRAKES FAIL TO RELEASE ON E WHEEL (VARIOUS WHEEL EACH TIME THIS OCCURS - LF TWICE, RF ONE, LR ONCE. BRAKES DRAG UNTIL BRAKES CALIPERS OVER HEAT AND CAUSE BRAKE FLUID TO BOIL, THEREBY LOOSING ALL BRAKING FORCE. MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM ON SOME OF THESE VEHICLES. REPAIRS ATTEMPTED ( COST OVER $1000) ON THE 3 FAILURES PRIOR TO TODAY'S FAILURE.  (WESTERN RECREATIONAL ALPINE 36SDS 2000) *PH  *JB    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**768027
